WorkItem.Description:
The use of settings like:
<servicedata name="localData">
        <address>http://www.service.com/Service/dataService.svc</address>
</servicedata >
 
fails with Warning:	The element cannot contain text. Content model is empty.
 
How can such setting be designed?
WorkItem.Summary: The element cannot contain text. Content model is empty.

Comments.Message:
That's actually a good question, because I've never seen any configuration file that has plain text inside a configuration element. I've been looking at the .NET Configuration system but I can't find a way to enable this type of configuration file, so unless you happen to know how .NET supports this I'm afraid I can't implement this work item...

The workaround would of course be move the text to an attribute of the address configuration element as such:
<address url="http://www.service.com/Service/dataService.svc" />
